name: Chicagodave NeoPixel Compass
tagline: Arduino code, example, for compass made with Arduino and Adafruit* NeoPixel Ring
body: ChicagoDave_NeoPixel_Compass ============================ Arduino code, example, for compass made with Adafruit* NeoPixel Ring. A video of working NeoPixel Compass can be seen on YouTube here: This project (as written for Arduino UNO) requires one @ADAFRUIT NeoPixel Ring attached to Pin 5, one LSM303 Accelerometer/Magnetometer breakout board... ...and the following libraries: Adafruit_NeoPixel Adafruit_Sensor.h Adafruit_LSM303.h Wire.h
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
